Properties.Description: NPC's that should act busy
How to search for the entities using the targetname.
The name of the node the first NPC in the queue should move to when he leaves the head of the queue.
The name of the first actbusy hint node in the queue.
The name of the second actbusy hint node in the queue.
The name of the third actbusy hint node in the queue.
The name of the fourth actbusy hint node in the queue.
The name of the fifth actbusy hint node in the queue.
The name of the sixth actbusy hint node in the queue.
The name of the seventh actbusy hint node in the queue.
The name of the eighth actbusy hint node in the queue.
The name of the ninth actbusy hint node in the queue.
The name of the tenth actbusy hint node in the queue.
The name of the eleventh actbusy hint node in the queue.
The name of the twelfth actbusy hint node in the queue.
The name of the thirteenth actbusy hint node in the queue.
The name of the fourteenth actbusy hint node in the queue.
The name of the fifteenth actbusy hint node in the queue.
The name of the sixteenth actbusy hint node in the queue.
The name of the seventeenth actbusy hint node in the queue.
The name of the eighteenth actbusy hint node in the queue.
The name of the nineteenth actbusy hint node in the queue.
The name of the twentieth actbusy hint node in the queue.
If true, NPCs much reach the front node in the queue before they're allowed to leave the queue.

InputOutputs.Name: Activate
InputOutputs.Description: Begin acting busy

InputOutputs.Name: Deactivate
InputOutputs.Description: Cease acting busy

InputOutputs.Name: SetBusySearchRange
InputOutputs.Description: Update the busy search range for all actors.

InputOutputs.Name: ForceNPCToActBusy
InputOutputs.Description: Force an NPC to act busy. Takes parameters, separated by spaces: <Targetname> <hint node targetname> <optional:teleport> <optional:$customactivityorsequence> <maximum time to actbusy>. If no hint node targetname is specified, it'll search for a random one. If no max time is specified, it'll use the default. Specifying 0 as the max time will make the NPC act busy until disturbed. If the optional teleport parameter is specified, the NPC will teleport to the act busy point. A custom move animation can be specified by prepending $ to the name of it. i.e. $ACT_RUN will make the NPC Run. Sequence names can be used instead of activities.

InputOutputs.Name: ForceThisNPCToActBusy
InputOutputs.Description: Force an NPC outputted from another entity to act busy. (only usable from an output that specifies an entity)

InputOutputs.Name: ForceThisNPCToLeave
InputOutputs.Description: Force an NPC outputted from another entity to find a HINT_NPC_EXIT_POINT hintnode and vanish.

InputOutputs.Name: OnNPCStartedBusy
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when an NPC targeted by this goal starts an ActBusy animation.

InputOutputs.Name: OnNPCFinishedBusy
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when an NPC targeted by this goal finishes an ActBusy.

InputOutputs.Name: OnNPCLeft
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when an NPC target by this goal finishes a forced Leave.

InputOutputs.Name: PlayerStartedBlocking
InputOutputs.Description: Tell the queue manager that the player has started blocking a spot in the queue.

InputOutputs.Name: PlayerStoppedBlocking
InputOutputs.Description: Tell the queue manager that the player has stopped blocking a spot in the queue.

InputOutputs.Name: MoveQueueUp
InputOutputs.Description: Force the queue to move up, sending the front-most NPC out of the queue.

InputOutputs.Name: OnQueueMoved
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the queue moves. Outputs the number of NPCs left in the queue.

InputOutputs.Name: OnNPCStartedLeavingQueue
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the NPC at the head of the queue starts to leave. The activator is the NPC, and the string is the name of the NPC.

InputOutputs.Name: OnNPCLeftQueue
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the NPC at the head of the queue leaves. The activator is the NPC, and the string is the name of the NPC.
